name: Ruck Deadlift to Row
cues: Hold a ruck plate (or dumbbells) at your thighs, feet hip-width apart
Hinge at your hips into a deadlift, keeping your back flat and core braced
At the bottom, row the ruck to your ribs, elbows tight to your body
Lower the ruck, then return to standing by driving your hips forward
Smoothly link the deadlift and row into one fluid motion
Focus on a controlled tempo (2 sec down, 1 sec up)
variations: Use dumbbells or a barbell instead of a ruck plate
Perform as separate deadlift and row movements for beginners
